overview: Inspired by a classic F. Scott Fitzgerald short story, 'Sati Shaves Her Head' is a modern take on the classic fish out of water tale. Bored during one hot summer, sophisticated Nikki transforms her dopey Indian cousin, Sati, into a beauty. But when Sati becomes more popular and sought after than she, Nikki learns a valuable lesson.
title: Sati Shaves Her Head
